item.title: 100% Bounty Hunter [317 DELTA]

i got 100 errors halp

The very first error it gives you in the cmd, Write it here. Then I can help you!

Its impossible to catch the first error as the cmd only takes 15 or so lines, the rest are deleted

Your computer sucks? I see 100 errors all each of them in my cmd.
[/quote]
The type of computer doesn’t change “how many errors you see.”

@post: Please read up on Java conventions and also “public ints” and “active a function” to touch up on your tutorial a bit.[/quote]

This is quite old when I didn’t know about conventions then, And what’s wrong with the ints I used?
